name: 男子生徒A
text: おい！
trans: Yo!

name: 男子生徒A
text: 今年の学園祭、アイドル呼ぶらしいぞ！
trans: I heard that they're inviting an idol to the school festival this year!

name: 男子生徒B
text: マジ？
trans: Seriously?

name: 女子生徒C
text: うちの中学にそんな予算あったの……？
trans: Our middle school has that kind of budget...?

name: 女子生徒D
text: それ～
trans: For real～

name: 女子生徒C
text: ていうか、アイドルって女性？　男性？
trans: Are we talking about a female or male idol?

name: 男子生徒B
text: 男は興味ねーからなー
trans: I'm not interested if it's a guy.

name: 女子生徒D
text: 男子はそうでしょうね～
trans: I don't expect anything better from you boys～

name: 男子生徒B
text: お？　女子は女のアイドルでも嬉しいわけ？
trans: Oh? So you're saying girls would be happy with a female idol?

name: 女子生徒C
text:
嬉しいに決まってんじゃん！
可愛い子が来るなら見たいもん
trans:
Of course!
If she's cute I'd love to see her.

name: 女子生徒D
text: それ～！
trans: Yup～!

name: 女子生徒C
text: 誰が来るのかな？
trans: I wonder who's coming.

name: 男子生徒A
text: 予想当てたやつにおごりな！
trans: Let's have a bet!

name: 灯織
text: （イヤホンして音楽でも……──）
trans: (I can hear them even with my music and earbuds on...──)

name: 女子生徒A
text: ……あの、風野さん
trans: ...Um, Kazano-san.

name: 女子生徒A
text:
……っ
えっと……
trans:
...Uh.
Well...

name: 女子生徒A
text:
風野さんは、誰が来ると思う？　って
話を……
trans: I just wanted to ask what's your guess on who's coming...

name: 灯織
text: ……どうして私に？
trans: ...Why are you asking me?

name: 女子生徒A
text:
風野さん、アイドルが来るって言った時に
少し気にしてたから……
trans: You seemed to be interested when they said an idol is coming...

name: 女子生徒A
text: アイドル、好きなのかなって
trans: I just thought maybe you liked idols.

name: 灯織
text: ええと……
trans: Well...

name: 灯織
text:
アイドル、ということしかわからないのに
予想なんてできないと思うんだけど……
trans: I can't simply take a guess when all I know is that, it's an idol...

name: 灯織
text:
そもそも、この話を私として、
彼女は何か得られるものがあるのかな
trans: Is there anything she can get out of this conversation to begin with?

name: 灯織
text:
全然話をしない私より、
仲のいい子とこういう話するほうが建設的じゃない……？
trans: Wouldn't it be more constructive for her to talk to someone she gets along with, rather than me, who barely talks to her...?

name: 灯織
text: その話、必要？
trans: Do we really need to talk about this?

name: 女子生徒A
text:
ご、ごめん
必要ないよね、戻るね
trans:
S-Sorry.
We don't have to. I'll stop.

name: 灯織
text: また、やった
trans: I did it again.

name: 灯織
text: （今の言い方、ダメだったな）
trans: (I shouldn't have phrased it that way.)

name: 灯織
text: （傷ついた……ような顔だった）
trans: (I could see that she was hurt...)

name: 灯織
text: （でも、なんて言えばよかったんだろう）
trans: (But, what should I have said?)

name: 灯織
text:
（謝るのも変だし……伝え直すにも
何を言えばいいの……？）
trans: (It's weird to apologize... And I don't know how to put it in another way...)

name: 女子生徒B
text: ……大丈夫？
trans: ...You okay?

name: 女子生徒A
text: 平気、ありがと
trans: I'm fine, thanks.

name: 女子生徒B
text:
どうして風野さんに声かけたの……
ああなるってわかってたじゃん
trans:
Why did you talk to Kazano-san...
You knew it was going to be like that.

name: 女子生徒A
text:
……そうだね
でも、クラスメイトだし……いつもひとりでいるし
trans:
...I know.
But we're classmates... and she's always alone.

name: 女子生徒A
text: 話すきっかけがつかめたかもって思って
trans: I just thought I could strike up a conversation.

name: 女子生徒B
text:
あれで……？
まー、もうやめときなよ。ちょっと難易度高いよ
trans:
That's why...?
Well, listen to my advice. Don't pick a battle you can't win.

name: 女子生徒A
text:
……
うん……そうだね…………
trans:
......
Yeah... You're right...

name: 女子生徒B
text:
風野さん、顔綺麗だし高嶺の花感あるし
なんか……本当とっつきにくいんだよねぇ……
trans:
Kazano-san is pretty, but she's hard to reach.
It's just... really difficult to approach her...

name: 女子生徒B
text: 会話続けてくれる気がないっていうか
trans: It's always like she doesn't want to keep any conversation going.
